page.heading: The Way of the Heart
page.content:
Jeshua's invitation to us is to wake up from every illusion that we have ever been separated from God, and to remember the deepest truth of who we really are: Christ.

The Way of the Heart is that pathway that begins with a commitment to healing and awakening, and is founded on the premise that you are perfectly free at all times. And everything that is experienced has been by your choice. And at no time has there been any other cause.

The Way of the Heart lessons, and original question and answer sessions, are the first year of 35 monthly lessons given by Jeshua during the years 1995-1997. Together they outline the steps and practices for awakening in Christ Mind.

page.heading: The Way of Transformation
page.content:
Jeshua's invitation to us is to wake up from every illusion that we have ever been separated from God, and to remember the deepest truth of who we really are: Christ.

The Way of Transformation is learning to transform your lived experience, so that you enjoy it more and more; are attached to it less and less; and fear it not at all.
~Jeshua

The Way of Transformation lessons, and original question and answer sessions, are the second year of 35 monthly lessons given by Jeshua during the years 1995-1997. Together they outline the steps and practices for awakening in Christ Mind.

page.heading: The Way of Knowing
page.content:
Jeshua's invitation to us is to wake up from every illusion that we have ever been separated from God, and to remember the deepest truth of who we really are: Christ.

The Way of Knowing is that way in which you have knowledge by direct experience, direct apprehension , by choosing to be only that…
~Jeshua

The Way of Knowing lessons, and original question and answer sessions, are the third year of 35 monthly lessons given by Jeshua during the years 1995-1997. Together they outline the steps and practices for awakening in Christ Mind.

page.heading: The Early Years
page.content: The Early Years is a collection of messages from Jeshua given prior to The Way of the Heart
